files.patch:
@@ -2574,0 +2574,3 @@
+  // According to the API specs, pow(-0.0, 0.5) = 0.0 and sqrt(-0.0) = -0.0.
+  // So pow(-0.0, 0.5) shouldn't be replaced with sqrt(-0.0).
+  // -0.0/+0.0 are both excluded since floating-point comparison doesn't distinguish -0.0 from +0.0.

@@ -1655,0 +1655,3 @@
+      // According to the API specs, pow(-0.0, 0.5) = 0.0 and sqrt(-0.0) = -0.0.
+      // So pow(-0.0, 0.5) shouldn't be replaced with sqrt(-0.0).
+      // -0.0/+0.0 are both excluded since floating-point comparison doesn't distinguish -0.0 from +0.0.
